chapters.title: Chapter 11: Just Another Sell-Sword
chapters.info: Kathana, p. 250—Short, dark-haired, fair-skinned proprietress at The Yearly Brawl, an inn in Ebou Dar. She is of an age with Mat. She has a motherly air about her—Mat thinks she is the type to lecture a tree for growing in the wrong spot. She is married to Jame.
